item.title: Block Storage and File Storage
item.description: Block Storage tgt framework could be used to implement a tgt server in user space. You could customize a new backend store type which could, for example, send the SCSI message in customized format via a socket. Then a user space program listening on the socket could deserialize from customized format and do some additional tasks on the SCSI message like multi-write them to different replicas.
